title: Spacious One Bedroom Apartments Available
posting_body: ['Aurora Meadows Apartments, managed by BLDG Management', '777 Dillon Way', 'Aurora, CO 80011', 'show contact info', 'Aurora Meadows, conveniently located in Aurora, Colorado, offers spacious studios, one and two bedroom apartment homes with convenient on-site amenities.', ' We are located just blocks from the new Fitzsimons Light Rail stop, Fitzsimons Medical Campus and abundant retail and dining establishments.', 'Community Amenities', '*Sparkling Pool', '*Business Center', '*Club House', '*Fitness Center', '*Laundry Facilities', '*Pet Park', '*Picnic & BBQ Grills', '*Playground', '*Sauna', '*Storage Space', '*Tennis Court', '*TV Lounge', '*Volleyball Court', 'Spacious one bedroom with one bathroom and versatile floorplan.', 'Located just blocks from the new Fitzsimons Light Rail Station, Fitzsimons Medical Campus and abundant retail and dining establishments.', 'Great in-unit and onsite amenities make Aurora Meadows the perfect place to call home.', 'Units are available now and we offer pre-leasing!', ' This apartment requires a $200 deposit.', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'Monday 9:30am - 5:30pm', 'Tuesday 9:30am - 5:30pm', 'Wednesday 9:30am - 5:30pm', 'Thursday 9:30am - 5:30pm', 'Friday 9:30am - 5:30pm', 'Saturday 10:00am - 5:00pm']
